root: ^Greetings, wanderer. How may we of the Order be of assistance to you?

c-1: ^As in the Church. I pray for the safety and longevity of each individuals’ soul.
c-2: ^While this is true, we can’t offer resources to every sorry sap wandering into the commune. I do hope you understand, Feline Wanderer.

Barter: ^Very well, you must purge all envy. We, the Order, believe in charity once proven worthy.

s: ^Do you usually just wait here until someone asks for your help?

c-0: ^Yes, soul. We call it ‘fruit of the soul’, the organic matter that powers our cores. Every living bot has one.

WaitHere: ^Not usually, Dear Wanderer. I am often running errands for the people of the commune or listening to their problems someplace else. You have found me during a rare rest period.
^Do not worry. Someone must do all this work for the betterment of every soul on this Earth.
BarterWin: ^Please do not hesitate to reach out to the Order again. May the Harvest bless you.
BarterLose: ^I will pray for your bartering skills to improve.
